user_stories.title: Create Customer Sales Order
user_stories.user_story: As a sales representative, I want to create a customer sales order in the system so that I can initiate the order-to-cash process for customer requests.
acceptance_criteria: System allows entry of all required sales order details (customer, product, quantity, price, delivery date).
System validates mandatory fields before saving the order.
Sales order is assigned a unique order number upon creation.
Order status is set to 'Open' after creation.
Order is visible in the sales order list.

user_stories.title: Edit Customer Sales Order
user_stories.user_story: As a sales representative, I want to edit an existing customer sales order so that I can correct or update order details before delivery.
acceptance_criteria: System allows editing of sales order fields before delivery is processed.
System tracks changes made to the order (audit trail).
System validates updated information before saving.
Order status remains 'Open' after editing.
Users cannot edit orders after delivery is processed.

user_stories.title: View Sales Order Details
user_stories.user_story: As a sales representative, I want to view the details of a sales order so that I can review order information and status.
acceptance_criteria: System displays all relevant sales order information (customer, items, pricing, status, delivery date).
Order history and status changes are visible.
System restricts access based on user role.
Order attachments (if any) are accessible.
Order can be searched by order number or customer.

user_stories.title: Cancel Sales Order
user_stories.user_story: As a sales representative, I want to cancel a sales order before delivery so that I can prevent processing of incorrect or unwanted orders.
acceptance_criteria: System allows cancellation of orders with 'Open' status.
Cancelled orders are marked as 'Cancelled' and cannot be processed further.
System records the reason for cancellation.
System updates inventory and availability accordingly.
System logs the user and timestamp of cancellation.

user_stories.title: Process Delivery for Sales Order
user_stories.user_story: As a warehouse clerk, I want to process delivery for a sales order so that goods can be shipped to the customer.
acceptance_criteria: System allows creation of delivery document for open sales orders.
System checks product availability before processing delivery.
Delivery document is assigned a unique number.
Order status is updated to 'Delivered' after processing.
System updates inventory upon delivery.

user_stories.title: Edit Delivery Details
user_stories.user_story: As a warehouse clerk, I want to edit delivery details before shipment so that I can correct delivery information if needed.
acceptance_criteria: System allows editing of delivery address and contact details before shipment.
System validates changes before saving.
System logs changes and user information.
Delivery status remains 'Open' until shipment is confirmed.
System restricts editing after goods issue is posted.

user_stories.title: Post Goods Issue for Delivery
user_stories.user_story: As a warehouse clerk, I want to post goods issue for a delivery so that inventory is updated and goods are marked as shipped.
acceptance_criteria: System allows posting of goods issue for deliveries with 'Open' status.
Inventory is reduced by the delivered quantity.
Delivery status is updated to 'Shipped'.
System records the date and user who posted the goods issue.
System prevents duplicate posting for the same delivery.

user_stories.title: Create Billing Document
user_stories.user_story: As a billing clerk, I want to create a billing document for a delivered sales order so that the customer can be invoiced.
acceptance_criteria: System allows creation of billing document only for delivered orders.
Billing document includes all relevant sales and delivery information.
Billing document is assigned a unique invoice number.
System updates order status to 'Billed'.
System prevents billing for orders not yet delivered.

user_stories.title: Edit Billing Document
user_stories.user_story: As a billing clerk, I want to edit billing documents before posting so that I can correct billing details if necessary.
acceptance_criteria: System allows editing of billing details before posting to FI.
System validates changes before saving.
System logs changes and user information.
System restricts editing after posting to FI.
System displays warnings for missing or incorrect data.

user_stories.title: Post Billing Document to FI
user_stories.user_story: As a billing clerk, I want to post the billing document to FI automatically so that revenue and receivables are recorded in the financial system.
acceptance_criteria: System automatically posts billing documents to FI upon completion.
Revenue and receivables accounts are updated in real time.
System generates FI document number linked to the billing document.
Posting errors are logged and notified to the user.
System prevents duplicate posting of the same billing document.

user_stories.title: Automatic FI Integration
user_stories.user_story: As a finance manager, I want the system to automatically integrate sales, delivery, and billing transactions with FI so that financial data is always up-to-date.
acceptance_criteria: All sales, delivery, and billing transactions are reflected in FI in real time.
No manual intervention is required for FI postings.
System provides error logs for failed integrations.
FI postings are traceable to their originating transactions.
System supports standard SAP configuration for integration.

user_stories.title: View Standard O2C Reports
user_stories.user_story: As a business analyst, I want to view standard order-to-cash reports so that I can monitor sales, delivery, billing, and financial performance.
acceptance_criteria: System provides standard reports for sales orders, deliveries, billings, and FI postings.
Reports can be filtered by date, customer, product, and status.
Reports display real-time data.
Reports are exportable to Excel or PDF.
Access to reports is based on user roles.

user_stories.title: Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.user_story: As a system administrator, I want to assign role-based access to users so that only authorized personnel can perform specific O2C tasks.
acceptance_criteria: System supports user roles for sales, warehouse, billing, finance, and admin.
Users can only access functions permitted by their roles.
Role assignments are auditable.
Unauthorized access attempts are logged.
Roles can be updated by administrators.

user_stories.title: End-to-End O2C Process Flow
user_stories.user_story: As a process owner, I want the system to support the complete O2C process flow so that all steps from sales order to FI posting are seamless and integrated.
acceptance_criteria: System enables transition from sales order creation to delivery, billing, and FI posting without manual intervention.
Each process step updates the order status automatically.
System prevents skipping of mandatory steps.
Process flow is configurable using standard SAP best practices.
System provides alerts for process failures.

user_stories.title: Audit Trail for O2C Transactions
user_stories.user_story: As an auditor, I want the system to maintain an audit trail for all O2C transactions so that I can track changes and ensure compliance.
acceptance_criteria: System logs all changes to sales orders, deliveries, billings, and FI postings.
Audit logs include user, timestamp, and details of changes.
Audit trail is accessible to authorized users.
Audit logs cannot be edited or deleted.
System supports export of audit logs for review.

user_stories.title: Error Handling and Notifications
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the system to notify me of errors during O2C processing so that I can take corrective action promptly.
acceptance_criteria: System displays clear error messages for failed transactions.
System sends notifications to responsible users for critical errors.
Error details are logged for troubleshooting.
System prevents further processing until errors are resolved.
System provides guidance or help links for common errors.

user_stories.title: Search and Filter O2C Documents
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search and filter sales orders, deliveries, and billings so that I can quickly find relevant documents.
acceptance_criteria: System supports search by document number, customer, date, and status.
System allows filtering of document lists by multiple criteria.
Search results are displayed in real time.
Users can save frequently used search filters.
Access to search results is restricted by user role.

user_stories.title: Standard SAP Configuration Support
user_stories.user_story: As a system administrator, I want the O2C process to use standard SAP configuration so that implementation is efficient and supportable.
acceptance_criteria: System uses SAP standard order types, delivery types, and billing types.
No custom development is required for core O2C processes.
Configuration documentation is available for reference.
System supports SAP best practices for O2C.
Updates and patches do not break standard configuration.

user_stories.title: Automated Status Updates
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want the system to automatically update the status of sales orders, deliveries, and billings so that I always know the current stage of each transaction.
acceptance_criteria: Status is updated automatically at each process step (order, delivery, billing, FI posting).
Users can view current and historical statuses.
Status changes are logged in the audit trail.
System prevents manual status overrides.
Status updates trigger notifications if configured.

user_stories.title: Prevent Manual Intervention in O2C Process
user_stories.user_story: As a process owner, I want the O2C process to run without manual intervention so that efficiency and accuracy are maximized.
acceptance_criteria: All standard process steps are automated using SAP best practices.
System flags any step requiring manual intervention for review.
Exceptions are logged and reported to process owners.
System provides metrics on manual vs. automated transactions.
Users can request support if automation fails.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories have been generated, covering all functional requirements and features for the SAP S/4HANA Order-to-Cash (O2C) process, including sales order management, delivery, billing, FI integration, reporting, controls, automation, and standard SAP configuration.
